context: Is this an ok front center speaker for a 7.1 surround sound system?
response: No. This is a powered sound bar. You would  do better with a typical center speaker.

context: Will this work for TitanFall?
response: I have not tried every feature of the controller, but the "Rapid Fire" does work with Titanfall.

context: I want to buy this game but it says 3Ds, is it eligible with a regular DS or just 3Ds
response: Just 3DS, you can algo play this in a nintendo 2DS

context: Are these wireless? I read somewhere that there is something to make the A40's wireless
response: No, the A40's aren't wireless.  However, the A50's are.

context: how well would it work on a samsung flat screen tv?
response: Light gun games (like Duck Hunt, Gangster Town, or Shot Put [for Summer Games], etc.) do not work with laser, projection, plasma, lcd, or led TVs. They only work for CRT TVs, which is probably why this system (rightfully) omits them.

context: All I use it for is net flix.  What unit do you suggest?
response: If you have the Wii, then you should be fine with NetFlix.  But if not, then perhaps getting a Wii U might be a good choice.

context: How much does this mouse weigh when the weights are taken out?
response: G500 without the Weight Cartridge tray is 161 g (5.68 ounce) and with the Weight Cartridge tray empty is 164 g (5.78 ounce). G500 technical specs: http://logitech-en-amr.custhelp.com/app/answers/detail/a_id/14191

context: What exactly is this item and how does one use it?  btw: I have the ps/3 trial installed but expired
response: Note that xiv costs 12:99 USD and 15 USD for more then one character so if you plan to Sub for 2 months total is 26 USD not 30. This also has to be deliver but it's convenient for those not wanting to use CC or gift.

context: This is my first time pre-ordering online. I live in Hawaii, will I get my game on the exact date of release or will you ship it on that date?
response: You live in Hawaii, why are you playing games? Get out of the house, go to the beach, surf, board, etc... Do what most of us can't do... and thats why we are home playing games :(

context: Can you adjust the light intensity and the color? or is it just blue?
response: The intensity is adjustable, in 3 levels if I recall correctly. The color cannot be adjusted, however, I believe that they have a model that is adjustable. The Raptop K40 and K50 have 16.8 million colors for the LED backlight, listed in the comparison of models here: http://www.corsair.com/en-us/gaming-keyboards#divCompare

context: what is the different between ps plus code and the code which included with the cd ??
response: If you buy a PS commonly they will give you 1 or 3 free months, it depends on the promotion, it is included on the bundle, but it will expire then you will not be able to play some games, this code will give you a full year, you can use it when your subscription expire.

context: What controllers are needed? Do I need the classic controller or will the regular one and nunchuk work fine?
response: The regular controllers work with the regular nunchuk... the nunchuks like in the game are optional.

context: Does this take AA batteries?
response: No it's rechargeable and the battery is one of the best lasting about 80 hours sometimes more

context: Mainly want simple Spider Solitaire for WIndows Vista - will this suffice?
response: Yes it probably will be overkill for just one game---Yank

context: Is the story line or jobs any different compared to the version that is out for the Nintendo DS 3D?
response: Yes, I don't have the DS version, but I've seen previews of it.  The Wii U version is much more HD, open, roamable world, and more challenging.  I recommend it.

context: Just ararived and does not work at all. tried several computers, not a problem on my end, the mouse is dead. unless there is some secret magic dance..
response: mine worked fine had no problems with it

context: What kind of emulators does this controller work with?
response: I use it with Jnes, but I think it would work with many.

context: Have to have the paintbrush
response: No need to spend the extra money on the paintbrush.  Game works off of the Wiimote/ nunchuk.

context: For what keys are there rollover support?
response: Don't buy it!!! It's a piece of junk. The keys on the keyboard rub off. I had the keyboard less than a year and 10 of the keys became unreadable. They where gone. I sent in a support ticket and got no response!!!

context: Can you use an xbox controller/gamepad?
response: Yah you just need the xbox wireless gaming receiver found here on Amazon

context: If I put my 3ds xl in this case would it be able to still fit in here?: HORI Retro Mario Hard Pouch for NEW 3DS XL and Nintendo 3DS XL
response: yes, it is perfect case for 3dsxl

context: can this hook up to ps3? ps4? i have a monitor with headphone jack, that works?
response: These will work with anything that outputs through a standard headphone jack.  That being said, these headphones sound best when used with a decent amplifier. Using just a headphone jack will allow for sound in your ears but the mic will require a dedicated mic jack in addition to the headphone jack to use the microphone.

context: Anyone else having wireless issues with this unit?  See my write up on my vita slim green/white.  I'm assuming I got a lemon but would like to hear.
response: Naw no issues at all

context: So, where is it already? I've had my order in for months, anyone have any better idea of a release date?  No answer from them.
response: oh really? The customer rep. was like okay and she did it right away... I mean it hasn't even been released yet and the price went down so I think its only fair for those who have been waiting for months for the item.

context: if I buy 2 of these, and entered both codes, do I get a 2 years subscription ? or do I have to store the other code until the first one expires?
response: You are correct you would have a 2 year subscription. You can pre-load a total of 3 years.

context: Just getting into these games; are there levels of difficulty on this game so a newbee can learn easily???
response: Yes there is. I played on the default difficulty and had a lot of fun. My fiancé who is not very good at shooters played on the second easiest difficulty and beat the game.  I believe there is 5 difficulty levels so anybody can have fun with it.

context: are the games downloads or disks, and does it need internet to play the games
response: They are on disks, and no, you do not need internet to play them.
